blog.description: I collect things that are: funny; make you more aware of the necessary social fight for the improvement of the world; fandom stuff about things I like (books, movies, tv shows etc.../!\ Please consider that I never ever tag my spoilers, ever); things about me, whatever the fuck said "me" might be of do; perhaps more *commercial yet useless sexy expression directed at you, dear tumblr user*

summary: I mean how weird is it that Jon stupidly held everybody down long enough for the Night King to kill down Viserion.
title: I mean how weird is it that Jon stupidly held everybody down long enough for the Night King to kill down Viserion.
body:
1) Either this is poor writing and this episode doesn’t make a lick of sense.
2) Or Jon is secretly a Night King’s agent.

summary: 22 Facts about Game of thrones that make this series even more interesting
title: 22 Facts about Game of thrones that make this series even more interesting
body:
Did you know that Game of Thrones is an international phenomenon with more than 20 million viewers?

Did you know that it has generated a cultural legacy unlike any other modern television program? Did you know that if you are naive enough to like a character in the series, that character will be horribly killed by drowning all your hopes?

And it will happen again and again … If you knew all these…

View On WordPress

Je suis en charge du fanbook de Joe pour la convention All men must die, organisée à Paris par Empire Conventions (25 et 26 août). N'hésitez pas à participer ! Vous pouvez m'envoyer vos lettres en anglais ou en français (je les traduirai) et participer aux différents projets. J’ai besoin de vous :)

I’m in charge of Joe’s fanbook for All men must die convention, hosted by Empire Conventions in Paris (on August 25th and 26th). You can send me a letter and participate to all this projects !! I need you !!

summary: This House Looks Ordinary From The Outside, Only Until You Step Inside And See Why It Costs $7,600,000
title: This House Looks Ordinary From The Outside, Only Until You Step Inside And See Why It Costs $7,600,000
body:
Dragons, battles and daring adventures. The beauty of fantasy novels is that they can take you to other worlds, but what if you could live in another realm every day? Well, Oregon artist and house developer Ed Bemis managed to make that possible. Tucked away in the foothills of Ashland, Oregon sits Shining Hand Ranch, a whimsical home that is so detailed it is fit for royalty from your favorite book.

This dream home was completely custom created by local artists and incorporates eco-friendly features. The space is heated and cooled with the use of geothermal energy with a solar heated pool. Intricate, hand-made pieces are the cornerstone of what makes this home unique. Bemis spent 1 ½ years alone carving the Brazilian mahogany arched front door. The 8,881-square-foot property spans across 706-acres, enough room to keep your dragon on. Bored Panda has your virtual photo tour of Shining Hand below, and if you $7,600,000 to spare all of this could be yours!

Welcome to the mystical kingdom of Shining Hand Ranch

It was custom designed with the help of multiple local designers

It took artist Ed Bemis 1 ½ years just to carve this intricate door

It’s all in the details, maple and cherry floors give the illusion of a flowing stream

This elaborate staircase was carved from manzanita branches (indigenous tree)

Artists incorporated lots of native imagery into the design details

Fire And Ice style mosaic dragons are one of the most intricate house features

The bathroom is decked out with blue Van Gogh granite

Large open windows look-out onto Mount Ashland, Taowhywee Point, Wagner Butte, Mount Shasta, and Pilot Roc

Geothermal energy heats-up the pool, housed in a separate building

Would you live here with your dragons?

Almost finished… To complete the subscription process, please click the link in the email we just sent you.

Read more: http://www.boredpanda.com/mini-kingdom-treehouse-ashland-oregon/

The post This House Looks Ordinary From The Outside, Only Until You Step Inside And See Why It Costs $7,600,000 appeared first on Viral TV News.



from WordPress http://www.viraltvnews.com/game_of_thrones/this-house-looks-ordinary-from-the-outside-only-until-you-step-inside-and-see-why-it-costs-7600000/

blog.name: ohsweetgirll
blog.title: The Great Beauty
blog.description: Above all things I love you

summary: Foolish Hearts
body:
Foolish Hearts

He had been bold and beautiful and golden with eyes like emeralds and she swears she did not love him not after what his family did to hers, not after the injustice but she thinks only in the crevices of her mind that perhaps she could love Jaime Lannister. Give him gold haired children with tan skin and eyes of swearling hazel because she was a fool a beautiful fool but a fool nonetheless.

Only the foolish could love a fool.

summary: [SPOILERS] Why was no one at Dragonstone?
title: [SPOILERS] Why was no one at Dragonstone?
body:
When Danny, Tyrion, etc. get to Dragonstone early in season 7 I was surprised no one was there. A humongous castle steeped in history, legend and myth completely desolate (supposedly since Stannis left there years ago). I was shocked no one was there! Not a soul. Even the odd exile who might have been passing by on boat and thought ‘free castle? Nah not interested!’ This was a bloody Kingdom, empty and abandoned for years. No one thought to set up camp there?



Source: https://ift.tt/2JNGxxB
